price: Bishaan danfaa keessa (harkifamanii) ergasii ibidda keessatti gubamu.
arabic: فِي ٱلۡحَمِيمِ ثُمَّ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يُسۡجَرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fī al-ḥamīmi thumma fī al-nāri yus'jarūna
